default_network_acl_id.description: The ID of the default network ACL to associate with the VPC. Must reference an existing network ACL.

egress.description: Defines the egress rules for the default network ACL, specifying outbound traffic permissions. Must include valid rule parameters such as protocol, ports, and CIDR blocks.
egress.type: list(object({action: string,cidr_block: optional(string),from_port: number,icmp_code: optional(number),icmp_type: optional(number),ipv6_cidr_block: optional(string),protocol: string,rule_no: number,to_port: number}))

ingress.description: Defines the rules for inbound traffic to the default network ACL, specifying allowed or denied protocols, ports, and IP ranges.
ingress.type: list(object({action: string,cidr_block: optional(string),from_port: number,icmp_code: optional(number),icmp_type: optional(number),ipv6_cidr_block: optional(string),protocol: string,rule_no: number,to_port: number}))

subnet_ids.description: List of subnet IDs to associate with the default network ACL. Each subnet must belong to the same VPC as the network ACL.

tags.description: Key-value pairs to associate with the network ACL for identification and organization purposes.
